channel.title: Infocom18 on SNLab Zone
channel.description: Recent content in Infocom18 on SNLab Zone

item.title: Two papers are accepted by IEEE INFOCOM 2018!
item.description: Two papers, “Prophet: Fast, Accurate Throughput Prediction with Reactive Flows” and “Toward the First SDN Programming Capacity Theorem on Realizing High-Level Programs on Low-Level Datapaths”, are accepted by IEEE INFOCOM 2018.
